attributes.name: Katra
attributes.description: Physical Action, Agility, Instinct-Driven Movement. Opposed by Imperius.

attributes.name: Dominion
attributes.description: Control, Endurance, Resilience, Stability. Opposed by Harmonia.

attributes.name: Imperius
attributes.description: Command, Willpower, Aggression, Force of Personality. Opposed by Katra.

attributes.name: Harmonia
attributes.description: Balance, Empathy, Healing, Emotional Equilibrium. Opposed by Dominion.

attributeGeneration.method: Antagonistic Point-Buy System. Each opposed pair (Katra/Imperius and Dominion/Harmonia) shares a fixed pool of points (e.g., 20).

uniqueMechanics.name: Imperial Funnel
uniqueMechanics.description: A five-step process where choices in one step (Birth Vector, Point of Origin, Faction, Edict) limit the options in the next.

uniqueMechanics.name: Gnosis/Entropy
uniqueMechanics.description: Alignment tracking for Order (Gnosis) or Chaos (Entropy), tracked on a -100 to +100 scale.

uniqueMechanics.name: Proficiency and Gate System
uniqueMechanics.description: Proficiency Tiers (Novice to Paragon) are tied to a Gate (Modifier Die) linked to an Attribute.

usfrNotes: The core mechanical loop is the Universal D100 system. The character creation process is highly structured by the Imperial Funnel and the antagonistic Pentagram Attribute system.
